about_the_game:
Lizard Survival Duo is an exciting survival platformer where you control two lizards simultaneously to dodge falling obstacles. Use quick reflexes and focus to navigate the challenge! Utilize speed boosts, shields, and invincibility buffs to stay alive and set high scores. The longer you survive, the tougher it gets. Easy to pick up, hard to master—become the ultimate survivor!

Overview

Lizard Survival Duo is a thrilling dual-control survival platformer. Manage two lizard characters, one yellow and one blue, each with distinct controls, and dodge falling obstacles to survive as long as possible. Quick reflexes, precise movements, and strategic item usage are key to success.

Key Features

  • Dual Character Control:
    Control two lizards simultaneously: one with A/D and the other with ←/→. Avoid obstacles and keep both alive.

  • Exciting Survival Gameplay:
    As time progresses, obstacles fall faster and spawn more frequently, adding intensity and challenge.

  • Diverse Buff Items:

    • Speed Boost: Temporarily increases movement speed.

    • Shield: Absorbs one obstacle hit.

    • Invincibility: Ignore obstacles for a limited time.

  • Addictive Simplicity:
    Simple yet challenging gameplay that’s easy to learn but hard to master.

Why Play Lizard Survival Duo?

  • Test your reflexes with unique dual-control gameplay.

  • Compete for high scores and challenge yourself with increasing difficulty.

  • Unlock Steam achievements as you survive longer and master the game.

name: Lizard Survival Duo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1030
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: It is a tension survival platform machine at the same time, and it is a nervous survival platform machine that avoid obstacles falling from the sky.Yellow and blue lizard is manipulated with different keys, and concentration speed and concentration is required.
